Uses of Interface
org.jruyi.io.IUnit

  • Packages that use IUnit 
    Package Description
    org.jruyi.io
    JRuyi IO Package Version 1.2

    • Uses of IUnit in org.jruyi.io

      Methods in org.jruyi.io that return IUnit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IUnit IUnitChain.create()
      Returns a new buffer unit.
      IUnit IUnitChain.currentUnit()
      Returns the buffer unit the position pointer is pointing to.
      IUnit IUnitChain.firstUnit()
      Returns the first buffer unit in this chain
      IUnit IUnitChain.lastUnit()
      Returns the last buffer unit in this chain.
      IUnit IUnitChain.nextUnit()
      The buffer unit following the current one becomes the current by forwarding the position pointer, and is returned.
      IUnit IUnit.set(int index, byte b)
      Sets the byte at the specified index to the specified b.
      IUnit IUnit.set(int index, byte[] src, int offset, int length)
      Sets length bytes starting at the specified index to the ones contained in the given byte array src, starting at the specified offset.
      IUnit IUnit.set(int index, IByteSequence src, int srcBegin, int srcEnd)
      Sets (srcEnd - srcBegin) bytes starting at the specified index to the ones contained in the given byte sequence src, starting at the specified srcBegin.
      IUnit IUnit.setFill(int index, byte b, int count)
      Sets all the count bytes starting at the specified index to the specified byte b.
      Methods in org.jruyi.io with parameters of type IUnit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IUnitChain.append(IUnit unit)
      Appends the specified unit to the end of this chain.
      void IUnitChain.prepend(IUnit unit)
      Prepends the specified unit to the head of this chain.
